---
title: "PRISMA article inclusion diagram"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r packages}
#install.packages("PRISMAstatement")
library(PRISMAstatement)
```

Here is an example from https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/PRISMAstatement/vignettes/PRISMA.html :
```{r example}
prisma(found = 750,
       found_other = 123,
       no_dupes = 776, 
       screened = 776, 
       screen_exclusions = 13, 
       full_text = 763,
       full_text_exclusions = 17, 
       qualitative = 746, 
       quantitative = 319,
       width = 800, height = 800)
```
